load.comment: 1% - If redeemed within 90 days from the day of allotment.  Nil - If redeemed after 90 days from the date of allotment.  xit Load will be applicable on switch amongst the Schemes of MOMF.  No  Load  shall  be  imposed  for  switching  between  Options  within  the  Scheme. value.scheme_objective: H The  primary  objective  of  the  Scheme  is  to  generate  long-term  capital  appreciation  by  investing  in  equity  or  equity  related  instruments  across  market capitalization of companies derive the majority of their income from  business in the Services sector of the economy.  owever,  there  can  be  no  assurance  that  the  investment  objective  of the  scheme will be realized.
value.suitable_for_investors: *  Capital appreciation over long term  Investing predominantly in equities and equity related instruments of companies engaged in the Services Sector of the economy. *
value.type_of_scheme: An open-ended equity scheme investing in Services Sector
